name: Halloumi Spinach and Tomato dish
instructions: Chop the Fennel and slice the courgette, place on oven tray and drizzle olive oil over the dish and add the spices. Place them in oven for 15 min.
instructions-extended:
In the meantime
Slice the halloumi and prepare the quinoa. Add the halloumi and cherry tomatoes to the oven dish and place in the oven for 10 more minutes. Blanche the spinach and serve the dish with Himalayan salt.
